description:
AJSM-31 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Poly Cotton Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Green

Give yourself a minimalist yet impactful aesthetic with this Essex Green number from ‘The Meerub’ by Asim Jofa. The juxtaposition of chiffon and poly cotton in this ensemble creates a balance of lightness and buoyancy feel. The chiffon dupatta with side borders is the flawless finishing touch. Yumna Zaidi radiates an ethereal aura in this ensemble that is nothing short of a poetic masterpiece in motion.
DESIGN DETAILS:

1.5 Meter Embroidered Booti With Border On Chiffon For Front & Back
1 Embroidered Neckline For The Front On Organza
1 Mtr Embroidered Sleeve With Border On Chiffon
4 Meter Embroidered Border For The Front And Back Chaak On Organza
2.5 Meter Embroidered Dupatta With Side Borders On Chiffon
1.5 Meter (Wider Width) Dyed Poly Cotton For Trouser
